Class ReceiptDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
dataaccesslayer.ReceiptDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReceiptsDao
public class ReceiptDaoImpl extends Object implements ReceiptsDao
Class roles First establish and check connection of the database Next uses interface in getting row invalid input: '&' column data from the database
